com.sonyericsson.capuchin
Interface FlashEventManager

public interface FlashEventManager

This interface should be implemented for registering events listeners defined by Flash.

The idea behind is to define events listener in Flash and register them in Java. When the event occurs in Java, Flash is notified and event data can be passed from Java to Flash.

The implementation of this interface should be registered in a FlashImage using FlashImage.setFlashEventManager(FlashEventManager).


Code example of using Flash Events Listeners

In Flash:

 .... 
 var eventHandler:Object = new Object();
 ExtendedEvents.MyEvent.addListener(eventHandler);
 
 eventHandler.onEvent = function(receivedText){
  myMovieClip.textBox = receivedText;
 }
 ....

in Java:

 .... 
 SampleEventManager eventManager; // implements FlashEventManager
 FlashEventListener myFlashEventListener; // will hold the event listener reference
 ...
 flashImage.setFlashEventManager(eventManager); // register event manager
 ....

As soon as the event listener is defined in Flash in the line ExtendedEvents.MyEvent.addListener(eventHandler), the addFlashEventListener(String, FlashEventListener) method will be invoked in Java:

 ...
 FlashEvent myFlashEvent;
 ...
 public synchronized void addFlashEventListener(String eventListenerName, FlashEventListener flashEventListener){ 
                  
  if ("myEvent".equals(eventListenerName){
  
  //Save the FlashEventListener handle       
  myFlashEventListener = flashEventListener;
  }
 }
 ...

Later in the application, my FlashEventListener can be use for sending events to Flash:

 ..
 String[] str = new String[]{"Hello World again!"};   
 myFlashEventListener.handleEvent(str);
 ...

Method Summary
 void addFlashEventListener(java.lang.String eventListenerName, FlashEventListener flashEventListener)
          This method is called when an event listener has been defined in the Flash content.
 

Method Detail

addFlashEventListener

void addFlashEventListener(java.lang.String eventListenerName,
                           FlashEventListener flashEventListener)
This method is called when an event listener has been defined in the Flash content.

Parameters:
flashEventListener - the FlashEventListener as defined by Flash, this object can be used later for sending events to Flash.
eventListenerName - the name used when this event listener was defined in Flash.
